title: If we mouse over Honor level, i wish it showed which honors we got.
body:
^
Basically when i mouse over the Honor icon it tells me how to get it and rank with it. But i wich that instead it shows me what type of honors i have received, similar to the last system.

replies.body: I don't understand what you are trying to say... if I remember the old system was something like: Teacher, friendly, Helpful, and Honorable Opponent, or something like that.

The old system showed you how many Friendly, Helpful, Teamwork, HO honors you had on your profile.

I am simply asking that the new system shows if you mouse over your Honor emblem how many Tiltproof, Great Shotcalling, and GGs you have gotten since the system was in place.
